item.description:
Meeting at Bickfords saturday morning at 8:30 a.m.
Leaving at 9:00 A.M.
We will be riding up route 27 and hooking onto route 2 and riding to North Hampton.
We plan on eating lunch once we get there, and do some walking around, and take in the sights..
Depending on the time we may end up riding back the mass pike.
So I guesse I would rate this ride a 2 1/5 :)
Please remember to arrive with a full tank and an empty bladder :)
item.name: North Hampton
